Package gw.api.exception

Interface HasErrorInfo

All Known Implementing Classes:
com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.AddressBookUnavailableException, AlreadyExecutedException, BadGatewayException, BadIdentifierException, BadInputException, BatchProcessException, CCAddressBookUnavailableException, ConcurrentModificationException, ConflictingResourceStateException, ContactSubtypeSpecificException, ContactSystemContactNotFoundException, ContactSystemNotAvailableException, ContactSystemPluginException, CorsException, DataConflictException, DataConversionException, DataTypeException, DisplayableException, DuplicateKeyException, EntityStateException, EntityValidationException, ExternalizableException, FetchLimitExceededException, FieldConversionException, FieldFormatException, GWIllegalArgumentException, InternalServerErrorException, InternalServerErrorWithoutCauseException, InvalidAuthenticationTokenException, InvalidResourceStateException, InvalidUserContextHeaderException, LoginException, NotAcceptableException, NotAuthorizedException, NotFoundException, OperationNotCurrentlyAllowedException, OperationNotSupportedException, PermissionException, RequiredFieldException, RestAuthenticationException, RestExceptionWithErrorInfo, ServerStateException, ServiceUnavailableException, SOAPException, SOAPRetryableException, SOAPSenderException, SOAPServerException, SuiteDependencyIsDownException, TerminatedException, TooLooseContactSearchCriteriaException, TransformFailedException, UnknownTypeKeyException, UnsupportedContentTypeException, com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException
public interface HasErrorInfo
This interface is only valid for exceptions, this is a flag interface indicating that any implementing class has error information that can be extracted.
